mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.task_title AS "taskTitle", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.explan_begin AS "explanBegin", a.explan_end AS "explanEnd", a.executor AS "executor", a.explan_work_cacounts AS "explanWorkCacounts", a.task_desc AS "taskDesc", a.requirement_source AS "requirementSource", a.requirement_classify AS "requirementClassify", a.business_system AS "businessSystem", a.requirement_emergency AS "requirementEmergency", a.sign_no AS "signNo"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO develop_taskassign( id, task_title, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, explan_begin, explan_end, executor, explan_work_cacounts, task_desc, requirement_source, requirement_classify, business_system, requirement_emergency, sign_no ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{taskTitle}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{explanBegin}, #{explanEnd}, #{executor}, #{explanWorkCacounts}, #{taskDesc}, #{requirementSource}, #{requirementClassify}, #{businessSystem}, #{requirementEmergency}, #{signNo} )
mapper.update: UPDATE develop_taskassign SET task_title = #{taskTitle}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, explan_begin = #{explanBegin}, explan_end = #{explanEnd}, executor = #{executor}, explan_work_cacounts = #{explanWorkCacounts}, task_desc = #{taskDesc}, requirement_source = #{requirementSource}, requirement_classify = #{requirementClassify}, business_system = #{businessSystem}, requirement_emergency = #{requirementEmergency}, sign_no = #{signNo} WHERE id = #{id}
